languages.text: "Вольный Торговец. Перейду сразу к делу — мне известно, что у вас {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}сменился любовный интерес{/d}". {n}Лицо Соломона непроницаемо, как стена из керамита.{/n} "Раз вы все решили, то вернемся к исключительно профессиональным отношениям, как и должно было быть с самого начала".

"Rogue Trader. I will be straight with you: I know your {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}personal affections{/d} have changed." {n}His expression is as impervious as a wall of ceramite.{/n} "Seeing as everything is already decided, let us return to a strictly professional relationship, as it should have been from the start."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец. languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. Je ne vais pas y aller par quatre chemins. Je sais que vos {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}sentiments{/d} ont changé,{n}énonce-t-il le visage de marbre.{/n} Puisque tout semble déjà décidé, il serait probablement mieux que nous revenions à une relation strictement professionnelle, comme elle aurait dû le rester depuis le début. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. I will be straight with you: I know your {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}personal affections{/d} have changed." {n}His expression is as impervious as a wall of ceramite.{/n} "Seeing as everything is already decided, let us return to a strictly professional relationship, as it should have been from the start."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. Je ne vais pas y aller par quatre chemins. Je sais que vos {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}sentiments{/d} ont changé,{n}énonce-t-il le visage de marbre.{/n} Puisque tout semble déjà décidé, il serait probablement mieux que nous revenions à une relation strictement professionnelle, comme elle aurait dû le rester depuis le début. »

languages.text: “行商浪人，我就不兜圈子了，我知道你的{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}个人感情{/d}已经发生了改变。”{n}他的表情宛如陶钢高墙一样冷硬。{/n}“既然你已经做好了决定，那我们就重新回到严格的职责关系之中吧。这件事情从一开始，就本该如此。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. I will be straight with you: I know your {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}personal affections{/d} have changed." {n}His expression is as impervious as a wall of ceramite.{/n} "Seeing as everything is already decided, let us return to a strictly professional relationship, as it should have been from the start."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，我就不兜圈子了，我知道你的{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}个人感情{/d}已经发生了改变。”{n}他的表情宛如陶钢高墙一样冷硬。{/n}“既然你已经做好了决定，那我们就重新回到严格的职责关系之中吧。这件事情从一开始，就本该如此。”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、率直に言います。あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}個人的な感情{/d}が変わったことはわかっています」{n}彼の表情はセラマイトの壁のように微動だにしなかった。{/n}「すべてがすでに決まっている以上、最初からそうあるべきだったように、これからは厳密に職務上の関係に戻りましょう」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. I will be straight with you: I know your {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}personal affections{/d} have changed." {n}His expression is as impervious as a wall of ceramite.{/n} "Seeing as everything is already decided, let us return to a strictly professional relationship, as it should have been from the start."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、率直に言います。あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}個人的な感情{/d}が変わったことはわかっています」{n}彼の表情はセラマイトの壁のように微動だにしなかった。{/n}「すべてがすでに決まっている以上、最初からそうあるべきだったように、これからは厳密に職務上の関係に戻りましょう」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir. Lafı dolandırmayacağım: {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Şahsi hislerinin{/d} değiştiğinin farkındayım." {n}Solomorne, seramitten bir duvar kadar katı konuşuyor.{/n} "Madem her şeyin akıbeti belli, en başından olması gerektiği gibi ilişkimizi resmî çerçeve içerisinde sürdürmeye geri dönelim."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. I will be straight with you: I know your {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}personal affections{/d} have changed." {n}His expression is as impervious as a wall of ceramite.{/n} "Seeing as everything is already decided, let us return to a strictly professional relationship, as it should have been from the start."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir. Lafı dolandırmayacağım: {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Şahsi hislerinin{/d} değiştiğinin farkındayım." {n}Solomorne, seramitten bir duvar kadar katı konuşuyor.{/n} "Madem her şeyin akıbeti belli, en başından olması gerektiği gibi ilişkimizi resmî çerçeve içerisinde sürdürmeye geri dönelim."

languages.text: «Comerciante, seré directo: sé que sus {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}afectos personales{/d} han cambiado». {n}Su expresión es tan imperturbable como un muro de ceramita.{/n} «Ahora que está todo decidido, podemos retomar una relación estrictamente profesional, como la que deberíamos haber mantenido desde el principio».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. I will be straight with you: I know your {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}personal affections{/d} have changed." {n}His expression is as impervious as a wall of ceramite.{/n} "Seeing as everything is already decided, let us return to a strictly professional relationship, as it should have been from the start."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante, seré directo: sé que sus {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}afectos personales{/d} han cambiado». {n}Su expresión es tan imperturbable como un muro de ceramita.{/n} «Ahora que está todo decidido, podemos retomar una relación estrictamente profesional, como la que deberíamos haber mantenido desde el principio».

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich werde offen mit Euch sein: Ich weiß, dass Eure {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}persönliche Zuneigung{/d} sich gewandelt hat." {n}Sein Ausdruck ist undurchdringlich wie eine Wand aus Ceramit.{/n} "Nachdem bereits alles entschieden ist, sollten wir zu einer rein professionellen Beziehung zurückkehren – wie es auch von Anfang an besser gewesen wäre."

I will be straight with you: I know your personal affections have changed." {n}His expression is as impervious as a wall of ceramite.{/n} "Seeing as everything is already decided, let us return to a strictly professional relationship, as it should have been from the start."
